author: Reuters Editorial
title: Chinese envoy takes veiled swipe at Trump for politicizing coronavirus
description: China's ambassador to the United States took a thinly veiled swipe at President Donald Trump on Tuesday by criticizing politicians bent on making "groundless accusations" that distract from scientific information on the deadly coronavirus.
content: WASHINGTON (Reuters) - China’s ambassador to the United States took a thinly veiled swipe at President Donald Trump on Tuesday by criticizing politicians bent on making “groundless accusations” that distract from scientific information on the deadly coronavir… [+2314 chars]
